DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect web-based intensive cognitive rehabilitation program neuropsychological performance population patient multiple sclerosis clinical isolate syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Neuropsychological Profile Patient 's Group With Multiple Sclerosis Effect Cognitive Rehabilitation Program
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives Primary : 1 . To determine effect intensive cognitive rehabilitation program neuropsychological performance population patient multiple sclerosis clinical isolate syndrome . Secondary : 1 . To characterize neuropsychological profile population patient multiple sclerosis clinical isolate syndrome . 2 . To evaluate relation Expended Disability Status Scale score cognitive dysfunction . 3 . To evaluate impact depression neuropsychological performance . 4 . To evaluate relation cognitive dysfunction 9-hole peg test . 5 . To evaluate relation cognitive dysfunction 25-foot walk test . Population Sample Patients select electronic database exist Centro Hospitalar Entre Douro e Vouga . They consecutively convoke proposed neuropsychological evaluation participation study . Every patient baseline neuropsychological evaluation ( table 1 ) . After , randomize training ( Cogweb® program Cogweb Monthly Notebooks® ) placebo 2 ( train ) :1 ( placebo ) fashion ( online program randomization ) . After 3-month period task ( train versus placebo ) , another neuropsychological evaluation battery use baseline . Patients include intervention arm computer internet access home perform minimum 3 session per week Cogweb® 3 month . Patients include intervention arm n't computer internet access home perform minimum 3 session per week Cogweb Monthly Notebooks® 3 month . Patients include placebo arm complete task ( send email copy journal/magazine head ) minimum 3 time week . Every patient include outpatient appointment end first second month task ( train versus placebo ) . The placebo group group patient multiple sclerosis , select accord inclusion exclusion criterion , database assign training . The neuropsychological evaluation plan comprise : global efficiency ( Montreal Cognitive Assessment test ) ; process speed ( read task Stroop test , symbol search Wechsler Adult Intelligence Scale ) ; attention ( letter cut Behavioural Inattention Test , Trail make test part B ) ; memory ( Letter number sequence Wechsler Memory Scale , digit memory , spatial localization Wechsler Memory Scale , logic memory Wechsler Memory Scale , word list Wechsler Memory Scale ) ; executive function ( colour name task Stroop test , inhibition INECO frontal screening , verbal initiative Lisbon Dementia Evaluating Battery , Zoo Map Ineco , Matrix Wechsler Adult Intelligence Scale ) anxious depressive symptom ( Hospital Anxiety Depression Scale ) . Sample Size There convoke 75 patient ( convenience sample ) . Design Experimental , single-center study . Clinical Practice Concomitant medication allow Any except corticotherapy . Discontinuation criteria 1 . Desire patient end participation study . 2 . Noncompliance intervention plan fail appointment predetermine . Parameters evaluate de study objective 1 . Neuropsychological battery : perform baseline 3 month completion study task ( test compose numerical , continuous variable ) . 2 . Expended Disability Status Scale score : screening baseline . 3 . Stage disease : screening database . 4 . Number year disease evolution . 5 . 9-hole peg test : perform baseline 3 month completion study task . 6 . 25-foot walk test : perform baseline 3 month completion study task . Efficacy Endpoints Primary : To determine intensive cognitive rehabilitation program change , statistically significant way , performance neuropsychological evaluation 3 month training , compare control group ( number test score one standard deviation normal value ) . There analyzed total partial score test . The individual cognitive deficit baseline analyzes rehabilitation group . The others ( without cognitive deficit cognitive evaluation baseline ) analyze separate group cognitive stimulation . Secondary : 1 . To characterize profile population patient multiple sclerosis , accord performance neuropsychological battery , term process speed , attention , memory executive function . 2 . To determine percentage patient Cognitive Dysfunction , define performance > 1standard deviation median ≥3 test battery . 3 . To correlate Expended Disability Status Scale score Cognitive Dysfunction . 4 . To correlate Hospital Anxiety Depression Scale score Cognitive Dysfunction . 5 . To correlate 9-hole peg test Cognitive Dysfunction . 6 . To correlate 25-foot walk test Cognitive Dysfunction . Safety Endpoints Not applicable .
DOC.criteria: Patients MS diagnose accord McDonald criterion 2010 clinical isolate syndrome patient . Age ≥18 year old . Informed consent . Disease relapse last month . Corticotherapy last month . Expended Disability Status Scale score > 6,0 .
